title: Find the Last Matching Value
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use list comprehension and the `next()` function in Python to find the value of the last element in a list that satisfies a given testing function.

meta.title: Python List Comprehension | Last Matching Value
meta.description: Learn how to use list comprehension and next() to find the last element in a list that satisfies a given testing function in Python.
meta.keywords: Python, List Comprehension, Last Matching Value, Programming Tutorials

verify.name: Verify Student's Find Last Operation
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
